alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nez Perce and central Lewis Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 524 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nezperce, or 14 miles west of Kamiah, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kamiah, Nezperce and Mohler. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 269 and 271. U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 52 and 54, and between mile markers 59 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
